mapper.insert: INSERT INTO memberinfo (memId, memPw, memNick, memPhone, memEmail, memHeight, memWeight, memBmi, memKcal, memGen, memAge, carbMin, carbMax, proteinMin, proteinMax, fatMin, fatMax, activityLevel) VALUES (#{memId}, #{memPw}, #{memNick}, #{memPhone}, #{memEmail}, #{memHeight}, #{memWeight}, #{memBmi}, #{memKcal}, #{memGen}, #{memAge}, #{carbMin}, #{carbMax}, #{proteinMin}, #{proteinMax}, #{fatMin}, #{fatMax}, #{activityLevel})
mapper.select: SELECT memNo, memId, memPw, memNick, memPhone, memEmail, memHeight, memWeight, memBmi, memKcal, memGen, memAge, carbMin, carbMax, proteinMin, proteinMax, fatMin, fatMax, activityLevel FROM memberinfo WHERE memEmail = #{memEmail}

SELECT memNo, memId, memPw, memNick, memPhone, memEmail, memHeight, memWeight, memBmi, memKcal, memGen, memAge, carbMin, carbMax, proteinMin, proteinMax, fatMin, fatMax FROM memberinfo WHERE memId = #{memId}
